      • toPosition

        public bwapi.Position toPosition()
        Transforms the Point into a Position object.
        Returns:
        a Position object with the Point's x and y values.

      • toTilePosition

        public bwapi.TilePosition toTilePosition()
        Transforms the Point into a TilePosition object.
        Returns:
        a TilePosition object with the Point's x and y values.

      • transformFromTilePositionToPosition

        public bwapi.Position transformFromTilePositionToPosition()
        Transforms the Point into a Position object. Can be used if the the currently stored Point is in a TilePosition format.
        Returns:
        a new Position object with the Point's x and y values multiplied with the ingame tile size.

      • transformFromPositionToTilePosition

        public bwapi.TilePosition transformFromPositionToTilePosition()
        Transforms the Point into a TilePosition object. Can be used if the the currently stored Point is in a Position format.
        Returns:
        a new TilePosition object with the Point's x and y values divided by the ingame tile size.

      • getDirectionToSecondPoint

        public Point.Direction getDirectionToSecondPoint(Point to)
        Convenience function.
        Parameters:
        to - the Point that the direction to which the direction of this one is calculated to.
        Returns:
        direction of this Point towards the second one.
        See Also:
        getDirectionToSecondPoint(Point, Point)

      • getDirectionToSecondPoint

        public static Point.Direction getDirectionToSecondPoint(Point from,
                                                        Point to)
        Function for getting the direction of a Point to another one.

        -> In which direction must the first Point move to meet the second one?

        Parameters:
        from - the Point that the direction is calculated from.
        to - the Point that the direction to which the direction of the first one is calculated to.
        Returns:
        direction of the first given Point towards the second one.

        public void display(bwapi.Color color,

        Convenience function.
        Parameters:
        color - the color of the displayed Point.
        filled - flag determining if the Point should be displayed filled or not.
        See Also:

      • display

        public void display(int radius,
                    bwapi.Color color,
                    boolean filled)
        Function for displaying the Point on the ingame map.
        Parameters:
        radius - the radius of the displayed Point.
        color - the color of the displayed Point.
        filled - flag determining if the Point should be displayed filled or not.
